about_the_game:
Show your ACID pride with the Dark Rose Vakyrie Deluxe Pack!

Includes:
・Character Art Collection - Character art of the members of the Special Force Valkyrie team. Find the traitor!
・Rough Art Collection - ACID's record of character sketches, Chimera designs, Valkyrie designs, and map images. Contains knowledge that will be essential in order to battle the looming danger of the Chimera Virus.
・(x5) PC wallpaper - Customize your PC with ACID-certified PC wallpapers.
・(x4) Mobile wallpaper - Take the Special Force Valkyrie team with you everywhere using these mobile wallpapers.
detailed_description:
Show your ACID pride with the Dark Rose Vakyrie Deluxe Pack!

Includes:
・Character Art Collection - Character art of the members of the Special Force Valkyrie team. Find the traitor!
・Rough Art Collection - ACID's record of character sketches, Chimera designs, Valkyrie designs, and map images. Contains knowledge that will be essential in order to battle the looming danger of the Chimera Virus.
・(x5) PC wallpaper - Customize your PC with ACID-certified PC wallpapers.
・(x4) Mobile wallpaper - Take the Special Force Valkyrie team with you everywhere using these mobile wallpapers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1GB VRAM or more and compatibility with Direct X 11.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960, ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible sound card

short_description: Show your ACID pride with the Dark Rose Vakyrie Deluxe Pack!
supported_languages:
English*, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
